subject: Writing
title: Edward R. Murrow Takes on McCarthy
description: Learn Edward R. Murrow Takes on McCarthy in one minute.

hook.text: In 1954, one TV journalist stood up to the most feared man in America â€” and won.

buildup.text: Senator Joseph McCarthy had terrorized the nation with accusations of communist infiltration.

discovery.text: Edward R. Murrow used McCarthy's own words and footage on CBS to expose his bullying tactics.

twist.text: Murrow's boss warned him the broadcast could end his career. He aired it anyway.

climax.text: Public opinion turned. The Senate censured McCarthy months later. His reign of fear was over.

punchline.text: One broadcast broke a demagogue's spell on a nation.

quiz.question: How did Murrow expose McCarthy on television?
options: By using McCarthy's own words and footage
